Package server

Interface Summary
QuizServices The QuizServices interface is used to let the clients talk to the server
 

Class Summary
CliParamParser A helper class for parsing commandline arguments
HighScore A class for calculating Highscores
Quiz The Quiz class manages all quiz tasks
QuizServant The Servant class provides the server functionality
QuizServer The server class starts the server
Score A class for use with the highscore feature
StateChecker The StateChecker regulary checks the servant and initiates the requested application features
